ExtendedSection.Title: Server-side preparation for a UGC session

Text.name: Text0
Text.content:
To use the JavaScript API minimal server-side preparation is necessary:

  • Include the JavaScript file ugc.nocache.js via a headinclude into the formatter that renders the form. The JavaScript file is shipped with the module org.opencms.ugc and located in the module's jar. The file exposes the UGC JavaScript API.
    Optionally, you can include the file ugc-jquery.js, found in the module's jar as well. It exposes an easy to use wrapper for the native JavaScript API.
    Here is an example formatter configuration that includes both JavaScript files plus an extra file that contains the form-specific JavaScript, using the API:
